name: Heart Attack (itch) (George Cranton)
description:
This was my first ever game that I finished back in August of 2020. It was for the Extra Cedits Game Jam #6 and was made in under 48 hours. About a year after releasing it, I decided to take it down along with another game called 'HATRED' but I've now decided to reupload it and format the webpage to its original state as best as I can.

This game was made in 1 day and 6 hours for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6 with the theme of 'take care'. The game jam lasted 3 days but I started it late so if there are any bugs, then that's probably why. There's only two levels as I didn't have time to make more. Hope you enjoy it!

How to Play:

WASD = Movement

Left Mouse Button = Shoot

Don't let the viruses get to the heart!
